department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: T-shaped blouse with rounded neckline with V opening in front; short sleeves; vents on either side at bottom hem; printed fabric; red background with black V's and spotted pumpkin-like gourds, alternating in orange with brown spots and brown with orange spots

title: "Kongo" blouse
